title: The Very Loud Coma - FULL DISCOGRAPHY
description:
THE VERY LOUD COMA â€” FULL DISCOGRAPHY

All albums in order of release:

COOKING WITH NOISE
an experimental album of mostly rhythmic noise. and some droning. and other weird stuff. 

NON-CANON EPISODES
a melodic experimental multi-genre electronic album.

THE GLITCH FILES
experimental idm/glitch music.

BLOODY SAVVY
atmospheric textural electronic music of various kinds.

SUNTHOUSAND
synthgaze and psychedelic vintage synthesizer music.

ARTIFACTS
an experimental album of crazy noises carefully sequenced into rhythmic structures. 

SYMBIOSIS
retro sounding synth music, soundtrack music, ambient textural stuff.

FAR GONE
collection of far gone music created with the help of analog and modular synthesis.

LUFTMENSCH
trippy / weird lo-fi dance music.

VERDI TRICKS
a collection of unfinished / outtake stuff.

GRIT
gritty electronic music relying heavily on tape effects, faux tape loops, plinky noise sequences, and hip hop rhythms.

THINGS THE MOON TOLD ME
modular synth experimentations, synthgaze, psychedelic ambient stuff, soundtrack-y stuff, downtempo trip hop stuff, trippy stuff.

ECHO TERMINAL
concept album about an old computer terminal gaining sentience or something
